base.name: box_shadow
base.title: Box Shadow
base.description: Default box shadow. Used with buttons, active states, and such.

header.name: box_shadow_header
header.title: Box Shadow Header
header.description: Default box shadow for header component.

card.name: box_shadow_card
card.title: Box Shadow Card
card.description: Default box shadow for card component that creates drop shadow, raised surface, and a border around the card.

nav.name: box_shadow_nav
nav.title: Box Shadow Nav
nav.description: Default box shadow for navigation component. Used in collapsed state.

popout.name: box_shadow_popout
popout.title: Box Shadow Popout
popout.description: Default box shadow to be used with all pop out windows.

modal.name: box_shadow_modal
modal.title: Box Shadow Modal
modal.description: Default box shadow for modal component. Used in dialogs, modals, and such.
